column1318: The rules in this subparagraph apply to all openings other than flangedin openings in dished heads covered by PG-29.3, PG-29.7, and PG-29.12; openings in flat heads covered by PG-35; and openings covered within PG-32.1.2, PG-32.1.4, and PG-32.1.5.131
column1319: When required, compensation shall be provided in such amount and distribution that the requirements for area of compensation are satisfied for all planes through the center of the opening and normal to the vessel surface.131
column1320: For a circular opening in a cylindrical shell, the plane containing the axis of the shell is the plane of greatest loading due to pressure.
